subject: How to invoke junit from Swing application?
msgSnippet: I try to invoke junit from Swing application; I did the following but it didn t work. If it is console application, it is working fine. Any ideas?? Thanks!
messageBody:
I try to invoke junit from Swing application; I did the following but it
didn't work. If it is console application, it is working fine. Any ideas??
Thanks!

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt)
{ ...
if (source == junitItem)
runJunit();
...
}

public void runJunit()
{
try
{
Runtime.getRuntime().exec("java "+ "junit.awtui.TestRunner
junittest.TestTest1");
}
catch(IOException e)
{
System.out.println(e);
}
}
